name: Zahra Ghasemi
aboutMeDescription: Hello, I am an intern UI/UX designer.I am 22 years old and I studied computer engineering at Islamic Azad University.I am very interested in solving challenges and collaborating in the UI/UX design field.
certificate1title: Foundations of User Experience (UX) Design from Google
certificate2title: Principles of UX/UI Design from Meta
ShayanHamidiC: Zahra showed a high level of web designing technical skills and was a valuable contributor the projects.She denotes a lot of analytical capability and willingness for both her personal & professional development. She learns quickly and I would have no hesitation in working with Zahra once again in the future.
MahdisNazemiC: Zahra is one of the most committed people I know and always tries her hardest to do her work. I am sure she will be one of the most successful people in this field.
MohammadKhaniP: Front-end Team Lead at Nodin Soft
MohammadKhaniC: Zahra is one of the best among all people I have ever worked with. She is always punctual, her knowledge is vast and extensive. Excellent and result driven. Works towards maximal customer satisfaction. Give her the really challenging tasks, the ones that everyone else is struggling with, and she will get them done. She is a trustworthy person and I will always hold him in the highest esteem.
